field.name: summary
field.value: Custom scaffolded views are broken (incl. patch)

field.name: description
field.value:
Scaffolding uses embedded views, unless some are provided locally. Unfortunately, this feature is broken for all scaffolded views except list.vm. It boils down to the various ComputeTemplateName method being vastly incoherent and returning broken paths.
I successfully patched the affected files and rebuild MonoRail. The feature then works as expected.
Affected files (patch against trunk follows):
$ svn status M MonoRail/Castle.MonoRail.ActiveRecordSupport/Scaffold/RemoveAction.cs M MonoRail/Castle.MonoRail.ActiveRecordSupport/Scaffold/UpdateAction.cs M MonoRail/Castle.MonoRail.ActiveRecordSupport/Scaffold/CreateAction.cs M MonoRail/Castle.MonoRail.ActiveRecordSupport/Scaffold/EditAction.cs M MonoRail/Castle.MonoRail.ActiveRecordSupport/Scaffold/NewAction.cs M MonoRail/Castle.MonoRail.ActiveRecordSupport/Scaffold/ConfirmRemoveAction.cs
